name: Big News!
description:
The teleprompter is on the fritz, and it's up to you to fill in the blanks of what's to come in the story.

How To Play:
When it tells you to type, start typing!

When it comes time to fill in the newspaper blanks, click on one of the dark gray rectangles to start typing in it. Press enter once every box is filled. ***Please capitalize the first letter of every word/animal!*** (EXAMPLE: Capybara, Lizard, I ate a ___Worm___)

Made by:

Art - Lanna 

Audio - Staintocton

Code - Voltage 

Game Design - Colekinz

created for Buddy Up Jam 2022: Winter 2022 😊
